phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
The Man Named Fanzell
Asta was gravely injured due to a curse placed on him by Vetto of the Third Eye.
The other members of the Black Bulls headed out to find a cure for his arms.
Noelle and Finral also visited a certain man to gain some clues.
I am coming in!
Oh, hey.
I just got out of the bath
The man that Noelle and Finral came to see is named Fanzell Kruger.
Who is this man, and what is his relationship with Asta?
To find out, we must look back in time to five months ago.
5 Months Ago
A Village Out in the Boonies, Hage
This story takes place just shortly before Asta and Yuno
departed for the royal capital to take the Magic Knights Entrance Exam
after receiving their grimoires.
Asta was camping out in a forest near Hage, training with his sword.
Wh-Whoa...
Is this what I am supposed to do?
I have no idea.
I never learned how to use a sword.
I have no idea how to stand or hold it.
Am I practicing right?
O-Out of the way, boy!
Look out!
Do not come this way!
Jump to the side!
Whoa...
Amazing.
You managed to get rid of it with a single blow.
I was trying to fish in the river,
but apparently I was in that boar's territory.
I-I see...
Fanzell Kruger
I am Fanzell.
I am on a journey.
Fanzell...
You can call me Zell.
Oh, I am Asta, from Hage Village!
Nice to meet you, Asta.
By the way, is that yours?
Yeah, why?
Man...
You are a lifesaver!
I have not had a bite in two days.
I could not catch any fish, either.
Right...
It is so dry.
It is like all the moisture is being sucked out of my mouth.
More importantly, why are you naked?
I did not want to get my clothes wet while I was fishing.
So, what are these?
You are eating them without knowing what they are?!
They are Hage Village's famous tatoes!
Tatoes, eh?
You okay?
Jeez, here.
Thanks...
Wait, what is this?
It is really bitter.
It is moguro leaf juice.
It is supposed to increase your magical power!
I feel much better.
I would like to thank you.
Why do not you come over to my house?
Your house?
Well, I am just staying there without permission, really.
I had no idea a place like this existed in the woods.
I just happened to find an empty house.
Oh, one sec.
I will go put some clothes on.
Ah, a sword that negates magic?
I have never seen anything like that before.
I am going to try to pass the Magic Knights Entrance Exam with this sword!
That is why I am camping out in these woods to train!
I see.
What are you doing here, old guy?
Old guy?
I am only 28, you know...
What?!
You are 28?!
You sure did not age well!
Well, that aside...
I am waiting for someone.
This deep in the mountains?
A lot's happened.
Huh...
By the way, Asta, you are camping out, right?
Why do not you stay here while you are training?
Really?
That would help me out a lot, but...
You are not planning to steal my tatoes, are you?
You should treasure your encounters and connections with others.
They might go away one day, but they are all experiences that build up in your heart.
Not a chance...
He is obviously suspicious.
Find out more about him.
Okay, I will take you up on your offer, Zell!
Great.
Now, let us decide who gets to chop up the firewood.
What?!
Take that!
Wh-Wh-Whoa!
This is not working.
It is probably because you are not carrying enough weight on your knees.
After you initially swing your sword, you try to attack again,
but it is not working well, right?
So you lose your balance.
Y-Yeah...
Always make sure your toes are facing the same direction that your sword is pointing.
Also, keep your right foot about half a step in front of your left.
Give it a try.
I did it!
I knew I could!
Yeah!
Y-Yeah...
You learned that pretty quick.
Glad it worked.
All right!
You are amazing, old guy!
You know how to use a sword?
Well, it is not exactly a sword, but...
One sec.
Wind Creation Magic: Emperor of Slashing Winds.
Awesome!
As you can see, my magic takes the shape of a sword.
The Emperor of Slashing Winds, or Slash for short.
You are even awesome at naming things!
So I have some experience with swords, too.
Then please show me how to use a sword!
What?
Come on, just a little bit!
Please!
Teach me!
Yeah, sure.
Huh?
Sure.
Y-You sure?
Yup.
Th-Thanks.
Yes!
This is awesome!
All right!
Woohoo!
Awesome!
Heck yeah!
There is just one thing I would like you to promise me.
Yay!
Asta, why do you want to become stronger?
To become the Wizard King!
I see.
That is great.
Excellent.
You are not going to laugh at me?
Why would I laugh?
Like... say that it is impossible, or whatever.
You will never know if it is impossible if you do not try.
Promise me...
that you will not use what I show you
for anything other than making your dream come true.
Sure.
What do I need to do?
Never wrongfully harm others or pick on the weak.
As long as you do not use it for anything bad like that, I will teach you.
You do not even need to tell me not to do stuff like that.
Then it is a promise.
Yeah, I promise.
Okay, let us do our best together.
Yeah!
I look forward to training with you!
A Few Days Later
You are following up too late with your left foot.
If you are going to attack consecutively, do not pause between each slash.
Got it!
Great job, Asta.
You are doing well with both attacking and defending.
Your movements are improving.
Since you are this strong, you should have been able to beat
that boar on your own no problem.
I did not have my sword or grimoire with me at the time.
Besides, my swordsmanship is not that impressive.
You are just more skilled than you realize.
I am pretty sure you are just a good teacher, Zell.
I used to do something like teaching.
That explains it!
Though my students never took me seriously.
I have taught over a hundred students,
but you are so talented that you would probably be in my top three.
Top three?
Actually, maybe top two.
Though the top one does not really use a sword like a sword, so that one would not count...
But anyway, I think you will do just fine, even if you join the Magic Knights.
You really think so?
Then let us get right back to training!
Hey, come on.
We are still eating here.
A few more days passed, and then she arrived.
Sorry I am late, Instructor Fanzell.
Who are you?
Mariella!
Did you find anything out?
Mariella?
She is one of my students.
Mariella
She is been helping me look for my fiancee.
I see.
Well, what are you waiting for?
Should not you look for her yourself?
Actually...
I cannot do anything that will bring too much attention to me.
I am Asta from Hage Village!
This old guy's teaching me how to use my sword.
Nice to meet ya!
I will have you know he is no ordinary man.
I know he looks old, but he seems even older.
I do not know who you are, but he is not
Old...?
some random old guy that you can lightly address as old guy.
I am only 28...
I told you!
I am Asta from Hage Village!
That is what he is, so why cannot I call him that?
It is a matter of recognition.
There is a big difference in the amount of respect you would show him,
knowing just how ancient he is.
I did not hear an ounce of respect in how you addressed him.
How the heck is old guy ever supposed to sound respectful?
Uh, could you stop?
He is just a random old guy!
That is all!
Everything you are saying is pretty hurtful, considering I am sitting right here.
No, you are saying it wrong.
More importantly, where is Dominante?
Where is Domina?
Actually, Miss Domina...
may have passed away.
Dude...
Fanzell explained to Asta what kind of situation he was in.
It turned out Fanzell and his fiancee Dominante belonged to the Diamond army.
The two of them could not bear the army's cruel ways any longer
and tried to escape,
but they were tracked down by some assassins and got separated.
Fanzell was supported by his former student, Mariella, who he let escape earlier,
and she was looking for Dominante.
If Fanzell made any rash movements, the assassins would learn of it,
so he had no choice but to hide in this house to keep
Dominante out of danger, just in case she was nearby.
That is a lot to take in...
This is Miss Domina's wand.
It was on the ground where you said the assassins attacked.
I also found quite a bit of blood there.
I see.
Sorry, could you leave me alone for a while?
Pardon me, Instructor...
Please listen to what I have to say.
Do you remember when you let me and the other students escape?
Yeah.
Is everyone doing well?
You actually smiled for a moment.
Well, you see, everyone else died.
What?
Assassins sent by the Diamond Kingdom...
killed them all.
What are you...
Sending the kingdom information
as well as eliminating any defectors is my job now.
If I did not cooperate, I would be killed, just like the others.
Oh, I will not kill you, though.
I was told to bring you back alive.
This place is completely surrounded, so you will not be able to escape.
A certain mage warrior has entered his final stages.
I am sure they need your advice on
the final adjustments he will need to function properly.
That is where you truly belong.
His name is Mars.
The boy's name is Mars.
Stop talking about him like he is just some kind of weapon!
Oh, sure.
That really does not matter to me.
You okay, old guy?
And what the hell, Mariella?
I thought you were grateful for all he did for you!
Of course I am.
It is true that I was able to survive because of the fighting techniques he taught me,
so I still respect him greatly.
That is why I warned you about your tone when you address him.
Then why the heck are you doing this?
Because if that is all I ever worried about, I would never be able to do my job.
So could you please stay out of our way?
You do not want to die for some old man you do not know, do you?
I know him pretty damn well now!
No, Asta. Mariella's right.
You should run.
You promised me that you would use whatever I taught you for your dreams.
It would be wrong to use that here for some old guy you do not know.
Hurry up and run!
I told you!
I know you, old guy!
Do not worry.
I can take care of these guys even if you are not around.
But you have been stabbed!
I promise you I will get out of this.
You would better keep that promise.
Do not you dare die before I see you next!
Got it!
Sorry, Asta.
You need to run.
Domina...
Wha
Asta, it is okay.
It does not matter what happens to me...
I have lost the will to live.
There is no reason.
Just leave me alone.
I am tired of all this.
What the hell are you saying?!
Will to live?
A reason to live?
Of course you are not supposed to automatically have that!
You are supposed to find those things for yourself!
If you understand, then get your ass up and join me!
Wind Creation Magic: Emperor of Slashing WindsWinter Wind.
Awesome!
That spells sends lots of Slashes flying out at once.
I call it the Flying One.
What an awesome name!
Sorry about that pathetic display.
I am all right now.
Right!
Do not let your guard down.
My guard's not down at all!
He negated my spell?
What is wrong, old guy?
You done already?
Only you can decide when you are truly done,
and you just taught me that now's not the time.
I am not going to let these guys finish me like this.
Let us retreat.
I will hold the rear.
Please make sure to gather the injured.
You are backing off, just like that?
To make a surprise attack, you must have three times the enemy's strength.
If you lose half your men, change your strategy.
If you lose half of that, then retreat.
That is what a certain someone taught me.
This is not the end.
I will hunt you down for the rest of your life.
Bring it on.
I am done running.
From all of you, as well as myself.
I am not going to be discouraged anymore.
Domina is alive somewhere, I am sure of it!
I am going to search everywhere for her, so you would better keep up!
You hear that, Mariella?
I hope you are ready to have to deal with his old man stench forever!
Could you shut up for a bit?
You are going to make an old man cry.
Please do your best.
Also, your tone has improved.
Do not forget that.
Are you really going to head out now?
Yeah, I am going to look for Domina until I find her.
And I am going to try to make up for all the wrongs I did in the meantime.
I have not decided exactly how yet,
but I need to at least spend the rest of my life trying.
So I will not die that easily.
Thanks to you, I have reevaluated my resolve.
I see.
Well, if we drag this out any longer, it will just be harder to say goodbye.
See ya, kid.
Hey!
Are you seriously leaving, just like that?
I am.
Time flows differently for those who try
to actually get stuff done and those who do not.
I have got to save time whenever I can.
Save time?
Really?
You are also someone who gets stuff done, right?
Get going, Asta.
You already have everything you need to get what you want done.
Jeez.
Now you act like a proper mentor?
See ya, old guy!
You would better become the Wizard King, kid.
Well...
I guess I should get back to the village.
Asta!
This is your final lesson!
Defeat this boar!
Do it yourself!
Also, why are you naked again?!
I do not have time to explain!
Hey!
Do not come this way!
Domina, where are you, my love?
I believe that you are alive.
Hey, miss!
I would like to ask you a question.
Wait, do not run away!
Black Clover, Page 56: The Man Named Fanzell Continued.
Page 56 The Man Named Fanzell Continued
Do not let it bother you that I am naked!
